snippet: “Flex Is Kings Live,” part of the Dumbo Arts Festival in Brooklyn, provided an introduction to the sometimes freakish street-dance movement called flexing.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews dance program Flex Is King Live as part of the Dumbo Arts Festival at powerHouse Books.
lead_paragraph: “Flex Is Kings Live,” part of the Dumbo Arts Festival in Brooklyn, provided an introduction to the sometimes freakish street-dance movement called flexing.

headline.seo: ‘Flex Is Kings Live,’ at the Dumbo Arts Festival
headline.main: The Body as Pretzel, With Lots of Mustard
headline.print_headline: The Body As Pretzel, With Lots Of Mustard
